column2: "13.  Where  an  action  instituted  under section  12  by any person  against the

column1: State for vindication of title to any land from which he has been ejected under
this  Act  has  been  decided  in
column2: favour  of  such  person,  such  person  shall  be

column1: entitled to recover a reasonable  compensation for the damage  sustained  by
reason  of his having been compelled to deliver up  possession of such  land."
